colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES DPAL LDAN RTZA BA'I BLA MA YI DAM LHA GSANG BDE 'JIGS GSUM SKYES BU GSUM GYI CHOS SKYONG BSRUNG MA RNAMS LA GTOR MA 'BUL BA'I CHO GA DNGOS GRUB SGRUB PA'I SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, ^ DGE LUGS PA'I DGE SLONG BDE CHEN 'OD GSAL GYIS BRIS PAS KYANG BLA MA LHA YI BYIN RLABS RANG GZHAN SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI RGYUD LA 'BAR BAR GYUR CIG , ,,` 'DI NYID DGE SLONG SKAL LDAN GYIS THUB BSTAN LHUN POR PAR DU BSGRUBS PA'I DGE BAS BLA MA'I ZHABS PAD BRTAN ZHING MDZAD 'PHRIN RGYAS PA DANG BSTAN 'GRO'I PHAN BDE 'PHEL RGYUR CIG , ,,)
